evidence.claim: Tradition Homecare is HIPAA compliant, ensuring secure handling of patient information.
The use of HL7 standards demonstrates commitment to interoperability in health data exchange.
FHIR is utilized to streamline access and exchange of health information.
Tradition Homecare partners with providers to support EDI transactions for billing and compliance.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of high volume X12 usage or API automation on their site.
